Uses of Class
com.google.mu.util.concurrent.Retryer.Delay

  • Packages that use Retryer.Delay 
    Package Description
    com.google.mu.util.concurrent
    Parallelizer (parallel stream using Executor), Retryer.

    • Uses of Retryer.Delay in com.google.mu.util.concurrent

      Methods in com.google.mu.util.concurrent with type parameters of type Retryer.Delay 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T extends Retryer.Delay<?>>
      java.util.List<T>      		 Retryer.Delay.timed​(java.util.List<T> list)
      Returns a view of list that while not modifiable, will become empty when duration() has elapsed since the time the view was created as if another thread had just concurrently removed all elements from it.
      <T extends Retryer.Delay<?>>
      java.util.List<T>      		 Retryer.Delay.timed​(java.util.List<T> list, java.time.Clock clock)
      Returns a view of list that while not modifiable, will become empty when duration() has elapsed since the time the view was created as if another thread had just concurrently removed all elements from it.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Retryer.Delay<E> Retryer.Delay.multipliedBy​(double multiplier)
      Returns a new Delay with duration multiplied by multiplier.
      static <E> Retryer.Delay<E> Retryer.Delay.of​(java.time.Duration duration)
      Returns a Delay of duration.

      Methods in com.google.mu.util.concurrent that return types with arguments of type Retryer.Delay 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Retryer.Delay<E>> Retryer.Delay.exponentialBackoff​(double multiplier, int size)
      Returns an immutable List of delays with size.
      java.util.List<Retryer.Delay<E>> Retryer.Delay.fibonacci​(int size)
      Returns a fibonacci list of delays of size, as in 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ... with this delay being the multiplier.
